title: Cabinet for old men! | Dirty Politics EP04

The list of Ministers:

01.    Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesighe ‚Äì Ministry of National Policies and Economic Affairs, Ministry of Rehabilitation and Prison reforms, Northern Development, Vocational Training, Skill Development and Youth Affairs.

02.    John Amaratunga ‚Äì Minister of Tourism Development and Christian Religious Affairs.

03.    Gamini Jayawickrema Perera- Minister of Buddha Sasana & North Western Province Development.

04.    Mangala Samaraweera ‚Äì Minister of Finances and Media

05.   Lakshman Kiriella- Minister of Public Enterprise Development, Upcountry Heritage and Kandy Development

06.    Rauff Hakeem ‚Äì Minister of Town Planning, Water Supply and Higher Education

07.    Tilak Marapana ‚Äì Minister of Foreign Affairs

08.    Rajitha Senarathne ‚Äì Minister of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine

09.    Ravi Karunanayake- Minister of Power and Energy and Business Development

10.    Vajira Abeywardhane- Minister of Internal & Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government

11.   Rishad Bathiudeen- Ministry of Industry and Commerce and Resettlement and Cooperative Development

12.   Patali Champika Ranawaka- Ministry of Megapolis and Western Development

13.   Naveen Dissanayake- Minister of Plantation Industries

14.   P. Harrison- Minister of Agriculture, Rural Economic Affairs and Animal Husbandry Development.

15.   Kabeer Hashim ‚Äì Minister of Highways and Road Development and Petroleum Resources Development.

16.   Ranjith Maddumabandara ‚Äì Minister of Public Administration and Disaster Management

17.   Gayantha Karunathilake ‚Äì Minister of Lands and Parliamentary Reforms

18.   Sajith Premadasa ‚Äì Minister of Housing, Construction and Cultural affairs.

19.    Arjuna Ranatunga ‚Äì Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation

20.   Palani Digambaran ‚Äì Minister of Upcountry New Villages, Infrastructure and Community Development

21.   Chandrani Bandara ‚Äì Minister of Women and Child Affairs and Development of Dry Zones

22.    Thalatha Athukorale ‚Äì Minister of justice and Prison Reforms

23.    Akila Viraj kariyawasam ‚Äì Minister of Education

24.    Abdul Haleem Mohamed Hashim ‚Äì Minister of Postal Services and Muslim religious Affairs

25.    Sagala Ratnayake ‚Äì Minister of Ports, Maritime Affairs and Southern Development

26.   Harin Fernando ‚Äì Minister of Telecommunication, Digital Infrastructure facilities, Foreign Employment and Sports

27.    Mano Ganeshan ‚Äì Minister of National Integration, Official Languages, Social Progress and Hindu Religious Affairs

28.    Daya Gamage ‚Äì Minister of Labour, Trade Union Relations and Social Empowerment

29.   Malik Samarawickrema ‚Äì Minister of Development Strategies, International Trade, Science, Technology and Research.

comments.comment: These old senile politicians in the parliament have no vision or no mission, but greedy for perks and privileges and because of that the country will never develop with their old fashion ideas.!!!! We need more educated, devoted young people to be in the parliament, not these old haggards.!!!

replies.replyComment: mahinda ranilata vada aurudu 6 k vitara vedimal..vede tiyenne u try karane namalta rajakama denna...mahinda hena fit kiyala pennanna unge vahallu ful try karanava...

@Sansala Dewmini niyamai niyamai nange rani wagay patta waysaveyanta ohoma thamai katha karana ona mama kiway ranita AIDS kiyala oketa GONOREYAWATH hadela thyanay  aka nisa okegay kimba kunu wayla ojas galanawa oketa akanisa dan ganeka wrteya karana baha mayketa dan teyana akama adayama commen t gahanawata UNP PONA MANGALAYA DAYNA rupeyal 1800 pamanai oketa ayin bayhayth ganath made  kasela wade kamata dan oketa pisuth hadela oluwa vekara wayla

Rani Fernando uba gona kiyanna one na ubage comments walin eka hodata penawa.uba kiyak ekka hikuwath Mata mokada wesiye?ubage ekata panuwo gahuwoth uba vidawai Mata kisima prahsnyak na. Loku talk dammata English wachanayak wath ba wage nugath kama pradarshane nokara edapana naki hitti.ubata samaja roga hadila kunu wela ati bawa penawa kiyapu beheth ubama ula ganin.ubata erisya karannama wade mn wate yanne na ubata erisiya karanna.maradane patte nemei bn mn enne. H I v ad's Mata natooo ubata tiyenam beheth kara ganin para gona.gon joke baduwak wage ubage comments balala Mata hinaha pissu nattam hodai vikara badu hikzz.
@Sansala Dewmini nange oya rani fernando kiyanay maradanay ina pata ganekawak oketa AIDS hadela teyanay lumpan UNP karayangay podu ganekawa thamai rani kiyana gona

Rani Fernando and Kari gono ubage ammgen ahapan thowa kiyakta ukala eliyata damnda kiyala.mokada ekith hodama gonek wenna ati gon baduwa wadapu ube kunuharupa walata mn bayada para wesiye naki ubata sudukodi peni peni kunuharupa reply karanna puluwanm tharuna Mata eta Wada puluwan.ubage duwek ennawanm dipan mada pipuna aliyekuta kelinna kari gona.kibma 4palala kochchi kiyanna naki visa yanna thoge. Yako bumithel gauna garadiya wage natanna ubane gossip wala ona kenekuta comments danna reply karanna puluwan.mn ubata banala reply kare na.banne unp ekata ranilta desapanaya gana comments karanam ubath uba akamathi pakse vivechana karapan.uba thamai mulinma thoge wesa kama pennanna kunuharupa reply kare.wayasata obina vidihata katha karapan ethakota apita garu karanwa wayasata.mn ubage amma appa adde na.ubata jathiyak jammayak nathi ekiyek.balapan Dan thamai mn ubage ammawa gawala comments kare.ubata vitharak nemei kunuharupa matath kiyanna dannawa.mn ubage comments balala nihada unanam uba thawa kenekuta karanne okamai  Dan wath igana ganin katha karanna. Garuthwaya labenna onanm anith ayata garu karanna purudu weyan desapanaya wadak na apita moka balayata awath kanna adinna denne na.vivechanaya karanna onama kenekuta ayithiya tiyenwa.uba modanam comments nokara edapan kauru hari reply karoth ubata ridenawane e hinda.
Rani Fernando naki wesiye ali paiya ubata arala ati kasillata erilama yanna.waren madinam yakada pollak rath  karala yawannm akiluna kimma hari yanna.ubata sapada Dan kata dila puka wanakaragatta.
Rani Fernando ubata wate allanna kimbak nathiwei ehenam wesi.naki kimba era ganna hithila wage.üêÇ
Rani Fernando naki wesiye ubata hukana ballo wasso tho hoya ganin.naki wesiyanta kohomath mol amaruwa wadine neda?bangali hukanwa ati ubata wateta alla alla hoya ganin Kari gona.
Rani Fernando uba kohomath hoda pattiyaka gon wassiyek kiyala Mata hithuna.
Wate allana gon wesiyange reply walata mn baya na.kiyapanko original ewain gona ranilta agilla danna dipan kari wesi.awa puka dila wana kara ganna.

Rani Fernando ow mn ata mirukuwa ubata mirikanna ranilta atayak tiyenna epyi neda?arabi karayekta hari allapan Kari gona.muslim hattata rata denna ona kamak tiyenne muslim eunta kiyala kelo ganna uba wage gon wesiyanta thamai.para gona uba hithuwe ubage reply ekata mn baye edy kiyalada.mewata comments danne uba wage gonnunta uttara denna balagena tamai gon wesiye.
Rani Fernando pitarataka edala bangali haminenena wesiyakda koheda gona.
Rani Fernando ganu nam Dan enna ponnayekda uba.ubata hodata ubage ammata lanilwa dmmala hukala purudu ati neda?uba Mona ponnayek unath wesiyek unath mn ubage kata walata baya na.
Rani Fernando attada hoda katha danna hoda gonek wenna athi neda uba.
Rani Fernando wenasa mokakda dannawada ranil napunsakayek mahinda pirimiyek napunsakayanta rata palanaya karanna ba.
Rata demalata thambiyaata giyath kamak ne mahindata nodee. Thopilage daruwo mewata wandi gewai. Thopi wage kuhakayo nisa anith minissuth amaaruwe.

replies.replyComment: Nilanga Mohan adath  mata  ahuuna ha ha ha....

@Nilanga Mohan brother monava katha kalath comments kalath sathya pamanak katha karanna. mama oya mahindavath ranil vath my3 vath ada venathuru dakala thiyenne TV eken hari u tube valin vitharai. avankavama kiyanavanam mama kisima pudgalika prayojanayak oya kagenvath aragenath ne idiriyedi ganna balaporotthuvak attheth ne. mata ape rate political system eka arahan. me system ekama venas karanna one. rate innava upathinma daksa ugath ratata adaraya karana avanka piris. language pava 3k 4k chathura lesa katha karanna puluvan. PHD thiyena aya. ada vela thiyenne a minissu me madagohuru desapalanayata enna kamathi ne. a ugath piris me velave ekathu venavanam avurudu 5k gihilla hari kamak ne aluth paksayak hadala balaya aragena me hora thakkadi desapaluvo pannala dala new moddle eke anduvak bihi karanna one. oba dannavane hitapu ha danata inne hora thakkadi desapaluvo bava. thanks

@Nilanga Mohan ape hamudava civil janathava pokuru pitin maruvanam a davasvalama jathyantharaya ekathu vela me rata akramanaya karala. LTTE eka civil janathava madata gihilla prahara ella kale. yuddaya kiyanne epa karapu siyallo pitu dakina deyak. America va irak Afghanistan yudda karaddi civil janathava marune nadda. school valata hospital valata ha weddings hall ekakata pava bomba dala samanya janathava gathanaya una. LTTE eka sinhala Tamil Muslim bedayak nathiva pokuru pitin civil janathava gathanaya kala. a thrastha kriya nathara karanna yanakota atharin pathara civil janathava marenna athi. anthima mohothe civil janathava ta LTTE eken vedi thiyaddi hamudava vedi nothaka civil janathava beragattha. civil janathava samaga apu LTTE samajikavan hamuda kandavuru athule bomba pupuruva gena hamudave hitapu ayath samagama maranayata path una. a nisa mahinda ekka obata pudgalika virayak thiyenavanam ohu hamuvela visanda ganna. nikan hithata apu paliyata comments danna epa. hariyata pahadili karanavanam pothak liyanna vevi. thanks.
